Posts.EditableText:
Do you mean when you try to examine them? You will need to add a description for the item if clothing in the Setup tab, down at the bottom of that page.

In room description will display the text wherever you drop the clothes, whilst look at description will display only when you examine an item.

If you mean when you try to take them, then make sure they are in the same location as you and listed as visible in the Setup tab.

If you mean something else, can you elaborate a little please?
